anytime: You can do all things through Christ.
evening: The beauty of winter is that it makes you appreciate spring.
When weeds go to heaven, I suppose they will be flowers.
I told you the Bible was more to be depended on than newspapers!
weather:rain: Perfect weather for a warm drink.
Rainy days are good for reflection.
weather:cloudy: The clouds can't hide your shine.
Great weather for thinking deep thoughts.
weather:thunderstorm: Let the thunder roll — you've got this.
Maybe light a candle and chill?
